result.execSummary:
The defendant Domminic S Canzoneri was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Probation may be transferred to Walworth county.

miscConds.notes:
Court costs to be paid as a Condition of Probation. DNA surcharge is WAIVED.

If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.
Maintain full time employment and/or school.
Submit to an AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment/counseling.

Maintain absolute sobriety.
Submit to random alcohol/drug screens.
Not to use or possess of alcohol or controlled substances without a valid prescription or any drug paraphernalia.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended.
No contact with Michael T., Apple Glen Apartments or Cameron M.

timeConds.notes: Condition Time - STAYED. To be used at Agent's discretion, as well as to the huber or straight time.
Perform as a Condition of Probation.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Domminic S Canzoneri in court with attorney Clarice Rosa Perkins.  Kristi J Gordon appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Parties proceed to sentencing on Ct. 1. 

Court orders the following: 
Ct. 1:
- 9 months jail straight time STAYED for 1 year Probation - Probation may be transferred to Walworth County
- Court Costs of $253.00 (includes DRGOD) to be paid as a Condition of Probation 
- DNA Surcharge waived
- Conditions of  Probation: AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment/counseling. Maintain absolute sobriety. Random U.A.'s..   Follow thru with any treatment/counseling recommended by Agent. No use or possession of alcohol or controlled substances without a valid prescription. No drug paraphernalia. Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed; Inform Agent of all prescriptions. Maintain full-time employment and/or combination of schooling. No contact with Michael T., Apple Glen Apartments or Cameron M..  
- Defendant to perform 75 hours of community service as a Condition of Probation. 
- 20 days jail  Condition Time (nonworking hours) STAYED to be used at the Agents discretion. Huber/Straight time to be used at the Agents discretion.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Domminic S Canzoneri in court with attorney Clarice Rosa Perkins.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count 1.  Court finds defendant guilty. Defense requests a separate date for sentencing in approximately 2 weeks. Court grants request.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for October 9, 2015 at 10:30 am.

Defendant Domminic S Canzoneri in court with attorney Clarice Rosa Perkins.  Brian Juech appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defense to contact Public Defender's Office to see if the defendant qualified or not for Public Defender Representation. Defense is asking for a 3 week adjournment. Court grants request.  Hearing scheduled for September 21, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Defendant Domminic S Canzoneri in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant contacted the public defender's office and advises he won't know if he qualifies for their representation until next week. Court will give a date in 2 weeks.  Hearing scheduled for August 28, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant to have no contact with victim/witnesses or the apartment complex listed in the Criminal Complaint. No contact with any co-actor.

Defendant Domminic S Canzoneri in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court advises of right to an attorney.  NOT GUILTY PLEA ENTERED.  Hearing scheduled for August 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Domminic S Canzoneri not in court.   District Attorney's Office Law Intern appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant called in and was unable to appear today. Court issues capias but stays to the next court date.  Hearing scheduled for July 13, 2015 at 08:15 am.
